qas.question: How much did China receive in donated money and goods?
What country was the largest aid donor to China?
How much financial assistance did Saudi Arabia give China?
How much money was donated from foreign sources?
What country was the largest aid donor to China?
How many international organizations made donations?

context: On May 16 China stated it had also received <a0_0>$457 million<a0_0/> in donated money and goods for rescue efforts so far, including $<a5_0>83 million<a5_0/> from <a1_0>19 countries<a1_0/> and <a2_0><a7_0>four<a7_0/><a2_0/> international organizations. <a3_0><a6_0>Saudi Arabia<a6_0/><a3_0/> was the largest aid donor to China, providing close to <a4_0>€40,000,000<a4_0/> in financial assistance, and an additional €8,000,000 worth of relief materials.
